contexts.context: ...that will fortify my own strength," said Oin. "I <mark>beg</mark> you to teach it to me now."
...that will fortify my own endurance," said Oin. "I <mark>beg</mark> you to teach it to me now."
...that will fortify my own agility," said Oin. "I <mark>beg</mark> you to teach it to me now."
